articles.title: A look at the educational qualifications of the Bachchan family members - TOI Etimes
articles.description: ​The Bachchan family, renowned for their iconic presence in the Indian entertainment industry, also boasts a remarkable journey of academic accomplishments. Here's a glimpse into their educational paths.
articles.content: Abhishek Bachchan attended schools in Mumbai, Aiglon College in Switzerland, and started studies at Boston University.
